question: University experience is more important than a university degree some people argue that university life is much important than an education degree in job market.do you agree or not agree
text: Globally, it has been observed that the university participation training is more significant part and more than a university degree and in resent years, governments have provided a lot of money for learning to produce a greet generation to be right position of jobs.They design collage and university with high quality of science and information also, in this essay, I will argue about the effect of literacy and wisdom on the job.

It is true that scholarship may be the foundation of good maturity government has devoted more time to developing a culture around schools, collages and universities and this is best for us as a result teaching person educated person is able to wonder in world because who have knowledge as well as they can work somewhere, additionally, literacy masses can handle any difficulties in our path in life because we have proper technique, moreover, people who have real skills, tools and technique will be successful in any sector of industry.

In other hand the people who have skill are more employable than, people, who do not have a performance sense as they cannot be considered your resume, the company’s management is required struggle contact, for example, experts can solve the stress of complex issues, who have skills about their field they can control that part like aviation engine task, rail line, as well as critical movement, which is usefully their skill.

In conclusion, there is a strong relationship between discipline and skill for anyone are looking for real success in this job, study depends on the theory, but training is based on practical application, educations and training are the extremely important to rich achievement and high quality in the job.
